custom-action.name: shutdown
custom-action.description:
Run a Choas Monkey engineering scenario defined in Gremlin.
Possible parameters are: - GremlinToken (required): Gremlin API Token Default value is "Gremlin API Token". - GremlinTeamID (required): Gremlin Team ID Default value is "Gremlin Team ID". - GremlinTargetType (required): Type of target : hosts or containers Default value is "Type of target : hosts or containers". - GremlinTargetHostTags (required): List of tags seperated by a , Default value is "List of tags to select the host that will be target by the attack". - GremlinTarget (required): Select the target by Percent or exact Default value is "percent or exact". - GremlinTargetNumber (required): Number of targets that would be impacted ( in percentage or exact depends on the value the parameter GremlinTarget Default value is "Number of targets that would be impacted ". Reboots or shuts down the targeted host operating system https://www.gremlin.com/docs/infrastructure-layer/attacks/shutdown
Possible parameters are: - Delay (optional): The number of minutes to delay before shutting down Value must be of type: Integer Default value is "1". - Reboot (optional): Indicates the host should reboot after shutting down Value must be of type: Boolean Default value is "true".

custom-action-parameter.name: GremlinTargetType
custom-action-parameter.value: Type of target : hosts or containers

custom-action-parameter.name: GremlinTargetHostTags
custom-action-parameter.value: List of tags to select the host that will be target by the attack

custom-action-parameter.name: GremlinTargetNumber
custom-action-parameter.value: Number of targets that would be impacted
